info.title: signCheck
info.author: The Lemon Man
info.details:
Features new in 0.3 :

[*] Now analyze any ios present on the wii
[+] Output a csv report of the wii ios set
[+] Usb2, boot2 and flash access test

For complaints, bitching or compliments contact me on #wiihelp or #HACKERCHANNEL (EFNET)
or on www.nextrl.it if you are italian :3
